title: Arthur Diamond on Openness to Creative Destruction
description: Arthur Diamond of the University of Nebraska at Omaha talks about his book, Openness to Creative Destruction, with EconTalk host Russ Roberts. Diamond sings the sometimes forgotten virtues of innovation and entrepreneurship and argues that they should be taught more prominently as a central part of economics.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
